title: [K-12] Learner-Centered Academic Library LibGuides Design Process

context.prior_knowledge: Basic competency in academic resource search and evaluation, experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A non-degree social field research/program for job seekers, measuring learning effectiveness through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the LibGuides content design process by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model.
Learners can create a LibGuides interface prototype reflecting learner-centered design principles.
Learners can design a LibGuides content structure suitable for social science research topics and improve it through peer review.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
